sentence: The five remaining GOP gubernatorial candidates include Tudor Dixon, Ryan Kelley, Ralph Rebandt, Kevin Rinke and Garrett Soldano.
author: Amy B Wang
title: Mich. GOP candidate ruled ineligible for ballot after fraudulent petitions

author: Jon King
title: Michigan 'quality guru' Perry Johnson remains off August primary ballot after unanimous court ruling

sentence: They include Norton Shores businesswoman Tudor Dixon, Ottawa County real estate agent Ryan Kelley, Farmington Hills pastor Ralph Rebandt, Bloomfield Hills businessman Kevin Rinke and Kalamazoo chiropractor Garrett Soldano.
author: Arpan Lobo
title: James Craig loses bid to appear on primary ballot after Michigan court denies appeal
